title: Print, " Nous jurons de faire baiser la Toile"
title_raw: " Nous jurons de faire baiser la Toile"
markings: Stamp in black ink on verso, vertically, lower left quadrant: MADE IN FRANCE
signed: Signed in pen and black ink, lower left of framing line: Chez Martineti
inscribed: On recto: imprinted in plate across lower margin: Nous jurons de faire baiser la Toile. In pen and black ink (encircled), lower left of image: L.  On verso, lower left corner, recent inscriptions in graphite: shop interiors; and to right of this inscription: Tk / 15/.  Lower left corner: #1162 / not for sale.
dimensions: 25.7 x 35.3 cm (10 1/8 x 13 7/8 in. ), uneven sheet
description: Parody of David's painting "The Oath of the Horatii" with textile merchants in a shop interior.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, " Nous jurons de faire baiser la Toile". Hand-colored engraving on wove paper. 
Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-397.
